description:
One of the main characters in the original 428: Fuusa Sareta Shibuya de and a surivor of the Shibuya incident, Minorikawa is a hot-headed reporter who is assigned to Shanghai along with Maria, who (along with Canaan) nicknames him `Mino-san`. He acts as both Maria`s supervisor and friend as he and Maria work to find out more about the strange cases in Shanghai.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Minorikawa Minoru
